ComicInfo.Summary:
House on the Edge of Eternity: James Phillips mysteriously disappears in front of his wife and son's eyes. Johnny Peril is hired to find out what happened.
Never Betray a Witch: Verna gets Wayne to ask for her hand in marriage so she can become a widow and inherit his wealth for her coven.
Summer Camp: The children at a summer camp summon a demon to take away their mean counselor.
ComicInfo.Title: House on the Edge of Eternity; Never Betray a Witch; Summer Camp
